message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it offers excellent value at this price, and I know you'll be very happy with it.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I think I can make you an offer of $120 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $125. I believe this price fairly reflects the value of the product.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and would like to propose $122 for the product. I hope this is within your range and allows us to reach a fair agreement.
